channel.title: Devolution 7.0 Attacking Problem!
channel.description: I'm using Devolution 7.0 and I can't attack most npcs! I can attack a Man but whenever i do that it Disconnects me! I know its not the Client because I have tried like 4 other clients. So there must be a problem. Does anyone have a fix for this?

item.title: Devolution 7.0 Attacking Problem!
item.dc:creator: @guitars595 guitars595
item.description:
@guitars595 wrote:

I’m using Devolution 7.0 and I can’t attack most npcs! I can attack a Man but whenever i do that it Disconnects me! I know its not the Client because I have tried like 4 other clients. So there must be a problem. Does anyone have a fix for this?

Read full topic
